name: OBLITERATOR (itch) (Suinotna, EsbenNyboe)
description:
In this physics-based space shooter, you fight the great black OBLITERATOR, using a gravity hook to launch asteroids at your foe. A cosmic barrage of physics and visuals inspired by real astronomical science, with a serene soundtrack of spacy sonics. 

Contribution to BRACKEYS GAME JAM 2020.1 ("Holes")

MADE BY:

ESBEN NYBOE,

VICTOR KIM,

ANTONIUS MARCUSSEN,

MARCUS MARCUSSEN
